amendment.description: An amendment to add a new section providing that not more than $50,000,000 shall be available for the purposes of managing and maintaining Internet websites and that none of the funds may be used to manage and maintain more than one Internet website for every 10 employees of the Department of Interior.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Hensarling amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Hensarling.
